text: Pirolate (CP-32,387) is an antihistamine drug with a tricyclic chemical structure which was patented as an "antiallergen". It was never marketed and there are very few references to it in the literature. == References == Category:H1 receptor antagonists Category:Nitrogen heterocycles Category:Lactams Category:Phenol ethers Category:Carboxylate esters Category:Heterocyclic compounds (3 rings)
title: Pirolate
